definition: second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]
alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols

sentences.english: Using polyethylene glycol dimaleate as crosslinking agent, a high water-absorbent resin was synthesized.
sentences.chinese: 用聚乙二醇双马来酸酯作交联剂制备高吸水性树脂。

sentences.english: It has now pioneered a method to turn cornfield debris into glycols.
sentences.chinese: 现在开创的新方法是把玉米田中的剩余物变成乙二醇。

sentences.english: Pegylated interferon alpha-2a in e-negative patients has a very good response.
sentences.chinese: 聚乙二醇干扰素在e抗原阴性的患者中应答非常好。

sentences.english: This article summarized the design and manufacture of ethylene glycol vessel.
sentences.chinese: 本文就乙二醇贮罐设计及制造加以总结概述。

sentences.english: In the past several years, a number of evaporators in glycol plants in China have experienced a lot of cracks.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，国内多个乙二醇装置的蒸发塔发现大量裂纹。

sentences.english: The other method runs room-temperature glycol through those same iced-over tubes.
sentences.chinese: 另一个方法是让室温的乙二醇通过外边结冰的管子。

sentences.english: Currently, PEGylation is commonly used as an effective method to prolong its half-life in serum.
sentences.chinese: 聚乙二醇修饰是目前有效地延长其半衰期的方法。

sentences.english: Glycol is oxidized rapidly by it to oxalic and glycolic acids.
sentences.chinese: 乙二醇迅速地被它氧化，生成草酸和羟基醋酸。

sentences.english: Cyclohexanone ethylene ketal is synthesized with silicotungstic acid as catalyst.
sentences.chinese: 以硅钨酸为催化剂合成了环己酮乙二醇缩酮。

sentences.english: The virus was purified by means of chloroform clarification, polyethyleneglycol precipitation and differential centrifugation.
sentences.chinese: 用氯仿澄清，聚乙二醇沉淀和差速离心可部分提纯。

sentences.english: The paper gives a modification plan for changing the product from ethylene glycol to ethylene oxide from the plant.
sentences.chinese: 制定了停产乙二醇，改产环氧乙烷的改造方案。

sentences.english: Usually in China it is used in combination with pegylated interferon.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，它通常与聚乙二醇干扰素联合应用。

sentences.english: The cooling load is regulated by changing the flowrate of the glycol liquid.
sentences.chinese: 通过调节乙二醇溶液的流量来调节制冷量。
聚乙二醇尿酸特定的酶。

sentences.english: The effect on the DTAB micellization by adding EG was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了乙二醇的加入影响DTAB胶束形成的原因。
